1080967039743942656.text: In October 2006, Congress approved the Secure Fence Act.  It passed the House 283-138 and later the Senate by 80-19.  Senators voting in favor included Sens. Obama, Biden, Boxer, Feinstein, Clinton, and Schumer.

1080965781918281729.text: In 1996, President Bill Clinton signed the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996 (P.L. 104-208), which expressly authorized the construction and improvement of fencing and other barriers along the Southwest border.

1080964470925676544.text: Constructing a physical barrier on our southern border has historically received bipartisan support.
